scripts.dev:
CONTAINER_STARTED=0; \
if ! podman-compose -f ../../compose.yml ps mortgage-ai-db 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Up"; then \
  echo "Starting database container..."; \
  podman-compose -f ../../compose.yml up -d mortgage-ai-db; \
  CONTAINER_STARTED=1; \
else \
  echo "Database container is already running"; \
fi; \
cleanup() { \
  if [ "$$CONTAINER_STARTED" = "1" ]; then \
    echo "Stopping database container..."; \
    podman-compose -f ../../compose.yml down mortgage-ai-db; \
  fi; \
}; \
trap cleanup EXIT INT TERM; \
pnpm migrate && podman-compose -f ../../compose.yml logs -f mortgage-ai-db
